Title: Empire of the Wolves
Writer: Jean-Christophe Grangé (novel), Jean-Christophe Grangé (screenplay), Chris Nahon (screenplay), Christian Clavier (screenplay), Franck Ollivier (screenplay), Luc Bossi (script collaboration), Simon Michaël (script collaboration)
Actors: Jean Reno, Arly Jover, Jocelyn Quivrin, Laura Morante
Plot: A disgraced policeman helps a young detective to hunt down a serial killer who targets Turkish women in Paris.
